00048 class NTBP_cylindrical_compartment_o : public NTBP_membrane_compartment_o {
00049 public:
00050 /***   Constructors, Copy/Assignment and Destructor  ***/  
00051 NTBP_cylindrical_compartment_o(NTreal length /* in muMeter */, NTreal diameter /* in muMeter */);
00052 NTBP_cylindrical_compartment_o(const NTBP_cylindrical_compartment_o & original);
00053 const NTBP_cylindrical_compartment_o & operator= (const NTBP_cylindrical_compartment_o & right);
00054 virtual ~NTBP_cylindrical_compartment_o();
00055 /* ***  Methods              ***/
00057 NTreal ActiveLengthConstant() { return _diameter()/(4.0 * _rA() * 1.0e4 * TotalConductance());}
00058 /* in muMeter^2 */
00059 NTreal _CrosssectionalArea() const {return _radius() * _radius() * M_PI;}
00060 /* in muMeter */
00061 NTreal _diameter() const { return diameter;}
00062 /* in muMeter */
00063 NTreal _radius() const { return _diameter()/2.0;}
00064 /* in muMeter */
00065 NTreal _length() const { return length; }
00066 /* ***  Data                 ***/  
00067 protected:
00068 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00069 /* ***  Data                 ***/  
00070 private:
00071 /* ***  Methods              ***/  
00072 NTreal diameter; // in muMeter 
00073 NTreal length; // in muMeter
00074 /* ***  Data                 ***/
00075 };
